entry.title: Sex Magick Aphrodisiac Potion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Passion -Bliss - Connection - Aphrodisiac - Euphoric - Calming - Energizing

This sexy formula is a reminder that pleasure is healing and blissful moments are medicine. It calls you to explore the world around you through your senses, and experience each day as sacred. As a circulatory stimulant, it brings blood flow to the peripherals and the heart center, so you can feel present and connected.

Chakra: Sacral
Name: Svadhisthana (“sweetness”)
Planet: Venus
Tarot: The Empress
Element: Water
Purpose: Movement and connection
Basic Right: To feel and have pleasure
Demon: Guilt
Identity: Emotional
Orientation: Self-gratification
Mantra: My sexuality is sacred

Benefits

  • Tuning into your senses
  • Coming into the present moment
  • Heart opening
  • Facilitates a connection with self and others
  • Helps release old wounds and trauma
  • An open Sacral Chakra

Ingredients

Cacao bean (Theobroma cacao), Damiana leaf (Turnera diffusa), Kava root (Piper methysticum), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water, Honey

Suggested Use

Suggested Use: 2-3 dropperfuls as needed. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

Ritual: Take your potion and pray into it. Call forth the spirit of bliss and allow yourself to relax and receive.

entry.title: Sacred Heart Cardiac Restorative
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Strength - Courage - Compassion - Antioxidants - QI Tonic - Uplifting - Vitality 

This fortifying tonic helps you find the sweet spot between an open heart, and a guarded heart. A heart that’s too open may manifest as an inability to set strong boundaries. On a physical level, this can lead to low blood pressure, lightheadedness, and even fainting. A heart that is too protected will manifest as emotional rigidity and physical anxiety felt in the chest. When your heart is balanced, you are able to establish a healthy rhythm in your body, move from a place of compassion, and connect more deeply to your community.

Chakra: Heart
Name: Anahata (“unstruck”)
Planet: Sun, Venus
Tarot: The Sun, Strength, Empress, 7 of wands
Element: Air
Purpose: Love and Balance
Basic Right: To love and be loved
Demon: Grief
Identity: Social
Orientation: Self-acceptance, acceptance of others
Mantra: I live in alignment with all that is

Benefits

  • Stimulating heart and circulatory tonic
  • Soothes the heart during times of distress
  • Supports in setting healthy boundaries
  • Reduces tension and anxiety in the heart
  • Cultivates patience and unconditional love
  • Open Heart Chakra

Ingredients

Hawthorn (Crataegus monogyna), Motherwort (Leonurus cardiaca), Linden (Tilia), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water, Glycerin

Suggested Use

Suggested Use: 2 dropperfuls daily. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

Ritual: Take 3 deep breaths to fill your lungs and make sure the exhale is longer than the inhale. Feel your breath while taking your awareness to your heart beat. Sip your tonic and feel the spirits of the plants surround and nourish your heart space.

entry.title: Incantation Spell Casting Elixir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Alchemy - Manifestation - Expression - Grounding - Uplifting - Energizing - Focus

You cast spells with every word you speak. This magickal elixir is made with sacred plants and embodies the energies of the four directions - water, earth, fire, and air. Being in touch with these elements within you connects you to the cosmos, aligns you with your truth, and empowers you to cast your spells and manifest your vision.

Chakra: Throat
Name: Vishuddha (“especially pure”)
Planet: Mercury
Tarot: The Magician
Element: Sound
Purpose: Communication and creativity
Basic Right: To speak and be heard
Demon: Lies
Identity: Creative
Orientation: Self-expression
Mantra: My words create my world

Benefits

  • Enhances concentration
  • Improves memory
  • Purifies mind and speech
  • Elevates mood
  • Support creative self-expression and clear communication
  • Helps to align words and actions with heart for a strong voice
  • Provides guidance and protection during spell work
  • Creates a ceremonial space to manifest your vision
  • Courage speaking up and expressing your truth
  • Alleviates cough and sore throats
  • Open Throat Chakra

Ingredients

Thyme (Thymus vulgaris), Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis), Black Sage (Salvia mellifera), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water, Honey

Suggested Use

Suggested Use: 2-3 dropperfuls as needed. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

Ritual: Take a moment to arrive and breathe deeply to settle into your body and engage your senses. When you cast spells, all levels of consciousness must be engaged. As you take the elixir, feel the spirits of the plants within you, empowering every cell in your body. Fill your lungs with air and speak out, calling in and manifesting your dreams.

entry.title: Immune Warrior Immune System Stimulant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Immunity - Protection - Renewal - QI Tonic - Antioxidant - Vitality

This stimulating tincture activates your immune system for ultimate protection against pathogens. It nourishes your Qi and gives you stamina when you feel depleted. It’s a potent formula, so be sure to only take it for 2 cycles of the moon.

Chakra: Root
Name: Muladhara (“root support”)
Planet: Mars, Saturn
Tarot: Tower, Emperor, The World
Element: Earth
Purpose: Foundation
Basic Right: To be here and have
Demon: Fear
Identity: Physical
Orientation: Self-preservation
Mantra: I trust in my body’s wisdom and its ability to keep me safe

Benefits

  • Powerful antiviral and antibacterial properties
  • Increases white blood cell count to fight off infections
  • Source of flavonoids to nourish and support the immune system
  • Boosts stamina when feeling sick and depleted
  • Helps you reconnect to your own source of power
  • A strong Root Chakra

Ingredients

Elderberry (Sambucus nigra), Echinacea Root (Echinacea angustifolia), Licorice Root (Glycyrrhiza glabra), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water

Suggested Use

Suggested Use: 3 dropperfuls as needed. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

Ritual: Take when coming down with symptoms of bacterial or viral infections. Call in the energy of Mars - the warrior and ruler of the immune system. Couple with rest and nourishing home-cooked meals, for ultimate self-care.

entry.title: High Priestess Meditation + Divination Ally
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Grounding- Uplifting - Calming - Focus - Intuition - Trust - Guidance

This magical potion will help you tune into the vibration of your third eye, opening you up to divine guidance while strengthening your psychic powers. Its bitter flavor heals stagnation and calms the nervous system - our greatest asset as witches. Use it as a tool for tapping into your intuition with deep trust and reverence to the wisdom of spirit.

Chakra: Third Eye
Name: Ajna (“to perceive and command”)
Planet: Moon
Tarot: High Priestess, The Moon, The Star
Element: Light
Purpose: Pattern recognition
Basic Right: To see
Demon: Illusion
Identity: Archetypal
Orientation: Self-reflection
Mantra: I see clearly and I’m open to the wisdom from within

Benefits

  • Increases psychic abilities
  • Moves energy to heal stagnation
  • Calms nerves and melts tension
  • Enhances lucid dreaming and dream recall
  • Consciousness shifting
  • Divine guidance
  • Breaking patterns of illusion
  • Connection to the moon
  • Opens Third Eye Chakra

    Ingredients

    Mugwort Leaf (Artemisia vulgaris), Blue Vervain Flowers (Verbena hastata), Blue Lotus Leaf (Nymphaea caerulea), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water, Glycerin

    Suggested Use

    Suggested Use: 2 dropperfuls as needed. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

    Ritual: Create a sacred space where you will be able to sit comfortably and turn inward. Sip your potion slowly. Let each sip bring you into a deeper state of receptivity. Pull a Tarot card or use your favourite tool for divination to guide you in between worlds. Trust the messages you receive.

entry.title: Focus Pocus Cognitive Support
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Clarity - Concentration - Mindfulness - Focus - Antioxidants - Energizing - Calming

This stimulating triad brings more circulation to the brain for elevated thinking. It facilitates memory and mental focus; getting you into a productive state of flow, and unlocking a new level of genius. Use it as a tool to move forward with a clear mind and a strong vision.

Chakra: Crown
Name: Sahasrara (“thousandfold”)
Planet: Mercury
Tarot: The Hermit, The Magician
Element: Consciousness
Purpose: Understanding
Basic Right: To know and learn
Demon: Attachment
Identity: Universal
Orientation: Self-knowledge
Mantra: I am in a state of flow and open to receive new ideas

Benefits

  • Enhances brain function
  • Facilitates memory and mental focus
  • Reduces brain fog
  • Increased blood flow to brain
  • Calms the nervous system to reduce anxiety and stress
  • Mindfulness when creating new habits
  • Soothes mental turbulence
  • Balanced Crown Chakra

    Ingredients

    Bacopa (Bacopa monnieri), Gotu Kola (Centella asiatica), Lion’s Mane (Hericium erinaceus), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water

    Suggested Use

    Suggested Use: 3 dropperfuls daily. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

    Ritual: Take 30 minutes before starting a task that requires concentration. Move intuitively for one minute to get your heart pumping and your blood flowing. Don’t be afraid to play and go upside down!

    *Shake well before use. Lion's Mane likes to settle at the bottom, which is perfectly normal, but you don't want to miss out on its medicinal properties!

entry.title: Dark Moon Restorative Sleep Triad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Rest - Restore - Renewal - Calming - Grounding - Vitality - Immunity 

This soothing elixir promotes deep rest and renewal. It stimulates delta brain waves for a nourishing, dreamless sleep to restore your body and calm your mind. Its descending action roots you down into the earth, allowing you to go deep into the dark void of Gaia’s waters to replenish your spirit and wake up feeling refreshed.

Chakra: Crown
Name: Sahasrara (“thousandfold”)
Planet: Dark Moon
Tarot: The Moon, Four of Swords
Element: Consciousness
Purpose: Understanding
Basic Right: To know and learn
Demon: Attachment
Identity: Universal
Orientation: Self-knowledge
Mantra: I am worthy of rest

Benefits

  • Promotes deep sleep and relaxation
  • Reduces running thoughts and insomnia
  • Soothes tension and irritability
  • Improves duration of restful sleep
  • Reduces time falling asleep
  • Reduces nervous activity
  • Balanced Crown Chakra

Ingredients

    Passionflower (Passiflora incarnata), California Poppy (Eschscholzia californica), Hops (Humulus lupulus), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water


    Suggested Use

    Suggested Use: 3 dropperfuls daily. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

    Ritual: Take before bed and go to sleep counting your blessings. Start with “I’m thankful for..." and you will fall asleep to wake up feeling refreshed, alive, and ready to start your day.

entry.title: Venus Glow Skin + Beauty Formula
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Beauty - Confidence - Radiance - Detoxifying - Beauty Tonic - Antioxidant - Vitality 

This sunny and joyful tincture supports the liver for healthy, glowing skin from the inside out. Its cooling properties reduce skin inflammation, redness, and heat while bringing more blood flow to the surface of your skin. It enhances your body’s natural detox pathways and supports cellular regeneration to help you age gracefully, and feel your best.

Chakra: Solar Plexus
Name: Manipura (“lustrous gem”)
Planet: Jupiter, Venus
Tarot: Empress
Element: Fire
Purpose: Transformation
Basic Right: To act and be an individual
Demon: Shame
Identity: Ego
Orientation: Self-definition
Mantra: I honor and nourish the beauty within me

Benefits

  • Improved skin tone
  • Thickens hair
  • Supports the kidneys, lymph, and liver for optimal detoxification
  • Regulates bowel movements
  • Protect cells from free radicals
  • Source of natural inulin, a prebiotic for healthy digestion
  • Alleviates eczema, acne, inflammation and skin conditions related to excessive heat
  • Calming for those who run hot and get irritated easily
  • Balanced Solar Plexus

Ingredients

    Dandelion Root (Taraxacum officinale), Milk Thistle Seeds (Silybum marianum), Burdock Root (Arctium lappa), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water

    Suggested Use

    • Suggested Use: 3 dropper fulls daily. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.
    • Ritual: Add this formula to your beauty routine! Take after washing your face in the morning, and allow your radiance to shine from within.

    *Shake well before use. Inulin, a prebiotic for healthy bacteria in your gut, gathers at the bottom when settled. This is normal and part of the medicine.

entry.title: Spirit Rising Uplifting Heart Tonic
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Expansion - Divinity - Acceptance - Adaptogen - Uplifting - Euphoric - Calming

This uplifting heart tonic supports the journey of your heart. It’s recommended for people who are suffering from a loss, feel a heavy heart, or want to connect deeper to spirit. It anchors you into unconditional love; asking you to consider how you are showing up and if you are allowing yourself to be guided by your heart.

Chakra: Heart
Name: Anahata (“unstruck”)
Planet: Sun, Venus
Tarot: The Sun, Strength, Hierophant, Wheel of Fortune
Element: Air
Purpose: Love and Balance
Basic Right: To love and be loved
Demon: Grief
Identity: Social
Orientation: Self-acceptance, acceptance of others
Mantra: Even when I feel (insert emotion), I love and accept myself

Benefits

  • Uplifts your spirit
  • Calms and soothes the heart and mind
  • Teaches you to listen to your heart
  • Imparts lightness and spiritual clarity
  • Stimulates vagus tone for relieving stress and anxiety
  • Lifts heaviness and congestion to help with grief and loss
  • Supports your ability to let go and feel safe
  • Open Heart Chakra

Ingredients

    Albizia (Albizia julibrissin), Rose (Rosa damascena), Holy Basil (Ocimum sanctum), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water, Glycerin

    Suggested Use

    • Suggested Use: 2-3 dropper-fulls as needed. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.
    • Ritual: Take this tonic when you’re feeling anxious or weighed down. Let the vibration of these plants lift your spirit and remind you that you are held. Take a deep breath and repeat the mantra "even when I feel (insert emotion), I love and accept myself."

entry.title: Strong Roots Adaptogenic Elixir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Vitality - Energy - Strength - Adaptogen - QI Tonic - Vitality - Grounding

This revitalizing formula nourishes your roots to restore your vital force. It helps you meet your daily challenges from a strong centre so you can show up feeling grounded and energized. Adaptogens take time to build up in your system, so it’s the perfect everyday tonic to strengthen your body’s natural defences and maintain optimal health.

Chakra: Root
Name: Muladhara (“root support”)
Planet: Sun
Tarot: Sun, Strength
Element: Earth
Purpose: Foundation
Basic Right: To be here and have
Demon: Fear
Identity: Physical
Orientation: Self-preservation
Mantra: I am taken care of, the Earth supports and meets my needs

Benefits

  • Restores the adrenal glands
  • Decreases the impact of stress
  • Increases physical endurance and athletic performance
  • Strengthens the immune system
  • Increases motivation and productivity
  • Provides deep, grounding, steady energy
  • A strong Root Chakra

Ingredients

    Ashwagandha Root (Withania somnifera), Astragalus Root (Astragalus membranaceus), Shatavari Root (Asparagus racemosus), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water

    Suggested Use

    • Suggested Use: 2 dropper-fulls daily. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.
    • Ritual: The longer you take this elixir the more your cells will be made up of these plants and embody their spirit. As you take your tincture, call in the energy of the sun. Feel it radiating and nourishing every cell in your body as it descends into your roots.
